name: SORCERERS (Amstrad CPC) By @SalvaKantero
description:
Einar, the great viking sorcerer of the Northern Lands, is dead. He leaves and old and mysterious castle behind, located on the top of a prominent mount. 

Includes 1p and 2P modes, with different goals.

1P) Your mission is to guide Sven to the top of the castle, trying to avoid all contact with enemies. 

2P) You have to get 5 ingredients with the maximum power before your opponent.
